mapper.sql: o.organization_pk, o.name AS o_name, o.address_1 AS o_address_1, o.address_2 AS o_address_2, o.city AS o_city, o.zip AS o_zip, o.state_province AS o_state_province, o.country AS o_country, o.email AS o_email, o.url AS o_url, o.phone AS o_phone, o.fax_number AS o_fax_number, o.notes AS o_notes, o.primary_poc_fk AS o_primary_poc_fk, o.project_fk AS o_project_fk, o.created_by_fk AS o_created_by_fk, strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f', o.created_date) AS o_created_date, o.last_updated_by_fk AS o_last_updated_by_fk, strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f', o.last_updated_date) AS o_last_updated_date, cbu.first_name || ' ' || cbu.last_name AS o_created_by, lubu.first_name || ' ' || lubu.last_name AS o_last_updated_by

primaryPoc.poc_pk AS primary_poc_pk, primaryPoc.project_fk AS primary_p_project_fk, primaryPoc.last_name AS primary_p_last_name, primaryPoc.first_name AS primary_p_first_name, primaryPoc.title AS primary_p_title, primaryPoc.email AS primary_p_email, primaryPoc.work_number AS primary_p_work_number, primaryPoc.fax_number AS primary_p_fax_number, primaryPoc.cell_number AS primary_p_cell_number, primaryPoc.last_updated_by AS primary_p_last_updated_by, strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%f', primaryPoc.last_updated_date) AS primary_p_last_updated_date

SELECT ,
FROM organization o LEFT OUTER JOIN users cbu ON cbu.user_pk = o.created_by_fk LEFT OUTER JOIN users lubu ON lubu.user_pk = o.last_updated_by_fk LEFT OUTER JOIN poc primaryPoc ON primaryPoc.poc_pk = o.primary_poc_fk
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO organization ( name, address_1, address_2, city, state_province, zip, country, email, url, phone, fax_number, notes, primary_poc_fk, project_fk, created_by_fk, created_date, last_updated_by_fk, last_updated_date ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{city}, #{stateProvince}, #{zip}, #{country}, #{email}, #{url}, #{phone}, #{faxNumber}, #{notes}, #{primaryPocFk}, ${projectFk}, #{createdByFk}, datetime('now', 'localtime'), #{lastUpdatedByFk}, datetime('now', 'localtime') )
mapper.update: UPDATE organization SET name = #{name}, address_1 = #{address1}, address_2 = #{address2}, city = #{city}, state_province = #{stateProvince}, zip = #{zip}, country = #{country}, email = #{email}, url = #{url}, phone = #{phone}, fax_number = #{faxNumber}, notes = #{notes}, primary_poc_fk = #{primaryPocFk}, last_updated_by_fk = #{lastUpdatedByFk}, last_updated_date = datetime('now', 'localtime') WHERE organization_pk = #{id}
mapper.delete: UPDATE organization SET deleted = 1 WHERE organization_pk = #{id}
